objects.specification: A flat rectangular floor panel with a neutral light grey low-gloss textured finish, providing a durable base surface for the booth interior.
A tall smooth wall panel with a pristine white painted finish, 0.1 meters thick and three meters high, forming the rear boundary of the booth.
A side wall panel made from smooth white-painted material, 0.1 meters thick and three meters tall, extending the full depth of the booth.

A modern reception desk featuring a smooth rectangular top surface and angular supports, finished in a vibrant bright blue tone to draw visitor attention.
A sleek display shelf unit with a minimalist metal frame and white laminate shelves, ideal for product presentation against the booth side wall.
